name: Village [prototype for jam]
description:
Village - a game in which you have to fight against evil spirits.

This game was created for [Godot Engine Russia] Winter Game Jam 2022 [04]

[The game was made in a week, and will be further developed.]

Evil spirits have started in the village, and you need to fight it! You have a pistol and... SPELLS!!! Why do you need spells? And because evil spirits grow with time! More information can be found in the "Tutorial" tab :)
